net.sf.JRecord.ByteIO

Class ByteTextWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.JRecord.ByteIO.AbstractByteWriter
      • net.sf.JRecord.ByteIO.BinaryByteWriter
        • net.sf.JRecord.ByteIO.ByteTextWriter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IByteRecordWriter

    public class ByteTextWriter
extends BinaryByteWriter
    This class will write an Array of Bytes to a file then write the appropriate End-Of-Line characters to the file. This allows hex field seperators to be used.
    Version:
    0.68
    Author:
    Bruce Martin
